评论概述: These are really hit and miss
评论详情: I want to love these sooo much. They are so close to perfect but just miss the mark. I love the material it’s soft and not see through! Great! However….the size smalls material is slightly thicker and more athleticy. I’m 5’2” and they hit right below the belly button. Perfect! Downside they run long. One other big problem for me though is the smalls are pretty small and as soon as I size up to a medium they are big and I mean big. :/ it feels like there should be a size in between the two. My other issue is that the material gathers behind my knees which is uncomfortable. So love the material and the lower waist. But such a sizing issue.

I rarely wear leggings and bought these for a costume.  When I tried them on I was hooked.  They are extremely comfortable and have a substantial feel to them.  I haven't washed them yet so I can't speak to that aspect.. .planning  on buying more of these for working out and ditching the baggy sweats.

I searched for the Lululemon print she wanted and came up empty until I stumbled upon Felina on Amazon. She loves them and I’m delighted. She loves them so much that she will be getting more and I will be ordering myself a pair to try as well!
